code: import{GET_LOGIN_STATUS}from"../action-types/login-action-types";var initialState=null;var loginStatus=function loginStatus(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case GET_LOGIN_STATUS:return state=action.payload;default:return state;}};export default loginStatus;
